result.title: Invitation to 24 Hours of Code
result.content:
Hello Coders,
Greetings from CodeBuddy !!

There is no CROWN without CROSS ... There is no PALM without PAINS ... There is no SWEET without SWEAT ... There is no GLORY without GALLANTRY…

After the two sky-rocketing contests that testified the intense competition for 24 hours, Codebuddy brings you the much awaited third edition of 24 Hours of Code to fill you with inexorable mirth yet again. So, be ready to experience yet another non-stop thrilling contest that will surely quench your appetite of algorithmic problem solving.

The contest shall span 24 hours, and will feature 10 problems of varying difficulty levels.

Contest Link: — https://codebuddy.co.in/contests/24HOCR3
Time:- 5th July 2017 08:00PM IST – 6th July 2017 :8:00PM IST

Mark your calendars for yet another exciting contest. We hope to see you all on the leaderboard. GLORY AWAITS YOU ALL IN THE ARENA !!!

Like our page for further updates : CodeBuddy

Thank You,
Team CodeBuddy
